***

How good is Taylor expansion of degree 2 approximation?

```{r}
originF <- function(x) sin(x)+sqrt(5*x^2-x+1)*exp(x)
```

```{r}
originF(0.0002) # 1.0003
ftb(originF, 0.0002) # 1.0003

originF(0.02) # 1.030977
ftb(originF, 0.02) # 1.030951
```
